channel.title: Print on darktable 3.8 user manual
channel.description: Recent content in Print on darktable 3.8 user manual

item.title: overview
item.description: This view allows you to print your images. Because printing is not easy, there are many technical aspects to be taken into account. After selecting an image in the lighttable view you can enter the print settings module to adjust printer settings and initiate printing. This module supports the printer’s ICC profile, which is somewhat mandatory if you want to obtain a high quality print close to the image displayed on the screen.

item.title: print view layout
item.description: The central area displays the image layout on the paper (the white area). Some gray borders may be displayed around the image to represent the printable area (the page minus the borders) not filled by the image. The filmstrip below the image allows you to select more images. ðŸ”—left panel collections Filter the list of images displayed in the lighttable. image information Display image information ðŸ”—right panel print settings Adjust print settings and initiate printing.
